Here for art thou T-shirt.

Without a doubt the most influential and talented writer in history. Born over 450 years ago, William Shakespeare produced more than 35 plays, many of which are still famous today. He was extraordinary at introducing new words &
column2: phrases into the English language such as

column7: As good luck would have it&nbsp
column22: Better part of valour is discretion&nbsp

column1:
These are just a few, there are literally thousands of words and phrase credited to Shakespeare that have no written references before Shakespeare penned them.
